p:
RNA was quantified prior to sequencing using the Qubit RNA HS Assay Kit. Sequence data had adapters trimmed off and human-derived reads filtered out (as described in the Methods section). The average read quality (based on Phred score
24, 25 ) was determined for all samples using FastQC ( www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/) (Fig.Â 4). Of the 14.4 billion reads generated, 99.59% had an average quality score of 20 or above. Users of the sequence data are responsible for performing their own quality checks.
